recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika, Ilmu Komputer, Teknik Elektro, Sistem Informasi (Diploma)
job_description:
IT Support
•  Assist the HPIC team in providing daily support to employees regarding the use of IT equipment.
•  Help with the maintenance and upkeep of IT equipment, including basic troubleshooting.
•  Support the installation, configuration, and setup of new equipment managed by HPIC.
•  Assist in administering and documenting IT inventory and activities within HPIC.
•  Help perform basic network checks and monitoring.
•  Provide technical support for internal meetings and events
